content: clarity and consistency | > The following attributes are included in the header and the value of the generated event. {.is-info} | Field Header Format | Field Value Format | | -------------------- | -------------------- | | `ce_type` | `type` | | `ce_source` | `source` | | `ce_time` | `time` | | `ce_id` | `id` | | `ce_subject` | `ce_subject` | | `ce_specversion` | `specversion` | | `content-type` | `datacontenttype` | > ISO-8601 instant format is used for date and datetime fields. Ex: "2011-12-03T10:15:30Z". {.is-info} # Crew Events - Crew Info - Crew Roster - Crew Pairs/Trips - Crew Duty - Crew Activity - Crew Flight - Crew Ground Activity - Crew Flight Transports - Crew Ground Transports - Crew Layover - Crew Simulator Flight - Crew Roster Notices - Crew Notification Alerts - Crew Qualifications - Crew Documents - Crew Base - Crew Bid - Crew Employment - Crew Communication - Crew Statistics # Flight Events - Flight Leg - Flight Leg Times - Flight Crew - Flight Delay - Flight Crew Need Vector # Flight Plan Events - Flight Plan Info - Flight Plan Alternative Airport - Flight Plan Runway - Flight Plan Weight - Flight Plan Fuel - Flight Plan Trip Info # Passenger Events - Flight PAX Info - Flight PAX SSR - Flight PAX Transfer - Pax Info - Pax Summary - Pax Boarding Summary # Aircraft Events - Aircraft Info - Aircraft Rotation - Aircraft Flight Duty - Aircraft Ground Duty - Aircraft Minimum Equipment List - Aircraft Weight & Balance # Ground Traffic Event # Tows Event # Weather Event # Air Traffic Event # Baggage Events - Baggage Info - Baggage Statistics # Stations Event # Ground Handling Events - Turnaround - Fuel Milestones # Reference Events - Timezone - UTC Offset
fm:title: River X Events description: Track source system data changes effortlessly with River X Events, avoiding complex integrations. Events adhere to CloudEvents standards. Explore River X Events Catalog for details. Refer to River X Data Model page for specifics on event message fields. published: true date: 2025-01-21T13:48:11.784Z tags: events, event-catalog editor: markdown dateCreated: 2022-11-02T14:43:54.976Z
